Posts.Content: I had lumpectomies for two tumours in June and then a further operation in July to remove all lymph nodes because there was a microdeposit of cancer in one of my lymph nodes - now I am waiting for radiotherapy and have been prescribed arimidex. After reading all the possible side effects of this drug I am a little worried particularly about the joint problems. Has anyone taken this drug - any comments on this. Would be really grateful as I am hesitating to start this drug at the moment. Thanks to all
Posts.Title: Drug Arimidex

Posts.Content: I am really new to all this. Hope this works - thank you to all of you who have replied - Susanjgreen, Tom L, Rosie 54 and Linfel. I am very grateful for all the information
Posts.Title: Drug Arimidex
